description:
MESERO RESTAURANT GROUP

Senior Catering and Events Sales Representative

Dallas-Ft. Worth Metroplex, Texas

About Us

Located in Dallas, Texas, we are part of the Mesero Restaurant Group, a distinguished name in the culinary and events industry, celebrated for delivering unparalleled dining experiences and expertly curated events. For the past 12 years, we have been at the forefront of gastronomic innovation and exceptional service, operating 7 successful locations. Our ambition is to grow our company to 15 locations across multiple states over the next 5 years. In alignment with this vision, we are seeking a Senior Catering and Events Sales Representative to join us. This role is crafted for a driven sales professional who is passionate about blending the art of sales with the finesse of event planning, thereby amplifying our brand's influence across the Dallas-Ft. Worth Metroplex and beyond.

Position Overview

The Senior Catering and Events Sales Representative is pivotal in driving our sales initiatives, particularly focusing on corporate sales and events. This role is about more than just sales; it's about creating unforgettable experiences and building lasting relationships. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker, a persuasive communicator, and an enthusiastic networker, skilled in both outside sales and detailed event planning.

Key Qualifications

Exceptional Communication: Outstanding ability to communicate effectively, negotiate deals, and articulate the unique value of our offerings, both verbally and in writing.

Advanced Interpersonal Skills: Innate ability to establish rapport, build trust, and maintain long-lasting relationships with a diverse range of clients.

Proven Sales Success: Demonstrable history of meeting or exceeding sales targets, preferably within the hospitality, catering, or events industry.

Organizational Expertise: Exceptional organizational skills, capable of managing complex projects with meticulous attention to detail from conception to execution.

Team Collaboration: Ability to work autonomously and as an integral part of a team, contributing to collective goals and successes.

Industry Knowledge: Deep understanding of catering and event planning, with the agility to anticipate trends and adapt to client needs.

Educational Foundation: Bachelor's degree in business, hospitality management, or related field is preferred, supplemented by significant industry experience.

Responsibilities:

Corporate Engagement: Proactively connect with businesses within the DFW area to promote our catering and event services, with a focus on corporate sales for meetings, conferences, and company events.

Strategic Sales Planning: Develop and execute innovative sales strategies to enter new markets, particularly targeting the corporate sector, to enhance revenue.

Client Relationship Development: Foster and maintain robust relationships with both new and existing clients, ensuring services are personalized and uphold our brand's high standards.

Custom Proposal Creation: Craft custom proposals, estimates, and event plans to meet each client's specific requirements, utilizing our advanced event software (extensive training provided).

Brand Advocacy: Serve as a dynamic ambassador at trade shows, event fairs, and client meetings, effectively promoting our brand's ethos and offerings.

Sales and Profit Goals: Surpass established sales and profit targets related to group events and catering sales, contributing significantly to our overall business success.

Continuous Learning: Participate in ongoing professional development to stay ahead of industry trends, sales techniques, and event planning best practices.

Compensation and Benefits:

Competitive base salary complemented by an attractive commission structure. An existing book of business (or leads) is welcomed but not required and will be considered in base salary evaluations.

Quarterly performance-based bonuses.

Flexible work arrangements allow for a blend of in-office, location-based, remote, or field work, adapting to business needs and personal effectiveness.

Application Process:

Motivated professionals with a passion for sales, a love for events, and a commitment to excellence are encouraged to apply. Please submit your resume and a compelling cover letter that speaks to your sales philosophy, relevant experiences, and why you are the ideal fit for this unique opportunity to [insert email/contact information].
• As we embark on an ambitious journey of expansion, we invite you to join us in redefining excellence in the catering and events industry. Together, let's create lasting memories and achieve groundbreaking success. We are excited about the prospect of welcoming a visionary sales leader to our team and look forward to your impactful contributions to our collective journey.
